title: Water erosion and waterlogging
creator_credit: Western Australia. Dept. of Agriculture and Gerry North
brief_description: Water erosion can result in the complete degradation of land by the removal of topsoils to expose infertile clay subsoils. The adoption of minimum tillage and other farm management techniques can lessen the risk of water erosion and improve farm productivity.
